remarks: Right angle and colinearity.  Theorem 8.10 of [Schwabhauser] p. 58. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Sep-2019.)
statement:
israg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
israg.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
israg.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
israg.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
israg.s $e |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) $.
israg.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
israg.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
israg.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
israg.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
ragcgr.c $e |- .~ = ( cgrG ` G ) $.
ragcgr.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
ragcgr.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. P ) $.
ragcgr.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. P ) $.
ragcgr.1 $e |- ( ph -> <" A B C "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
ragcgr.2 $e |- ( ph -> <" A B C "> .~ <" D E F "> ) $.
ragcgr $p |- ( ph -> <" D E F "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
